item.description:
I always pass by this resturant but I have never been inside of it. So far it looks very elegant, quite peaceful and well organized. It would be so cool to gab a whole group of us, maybe 10 or 15 of us. This would be a great chance to meet other females in boston who have the same interest and also for girls who are new to boston. I don't know when a good date would be but hopefully next weekend sounds good. Let me know if anyone is interested.

Love

Paigey
item.name: Pigalles resturant
